<script>
function animateStat(id, target, duration) {
  var el = document.getElementById(id);
  if (!el) return;
  var step = Math.ceil(target / (duration/20));
  var val = 0;
  var interval = setInterval(function() {
    val += step;
    if (val >= target) { val = target; clearInterval(interval); }
    el.textContent = val;
  }, 20);
}
animateStat('exp-stat', 25, 800);
animateStat('proj-stat', 30, 800);
animateStat('cert-stat', 3, 800);
</script>
